com.tractrac.model.lib.api.event

Interface IEventFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tractrac.common.lib.api.service.IServiceProvider

    public interface IEventFactory
extends com.tractrac.common.lib.api.service.IServiceProvider

    Factory used to create an IEvent. The instance of this factory can be retrieved using the ModelLocator class.

    Author:
    Jorge Piera Llodrá
    See Also:
    Factory
